text: Hey Kevin :wave: - that can be set under the meta-description of the blog in blog settings.
<@U013KTK1XBL> do you mind sending me over a DM with a link to a page that you're working so I can take a closer look at your setup?
Thanks <@U26AKMZ19>!  Should have tried that actually. The theme is getting SUPER close to done. :slightly_smiling_face:
No problem :thumbsup: So excited! Can't wait to see it.
